# Bibliography {#bibli}

Pishro-Nik, H. (2014). Introduction to Probability: Statistics and Random Processes. Blue Bell, PA: Kappa Research, LLC.

Wheelan, C. (2013). Naked Statistics: Stripping the Dread from the Data. New York: W.W. Norton.
